description: These simple beef empanadas are perfect to serve at your next gathering. The addition of green olive adds an extra tangy zing guests will love.
name: Spiced Beef & Olive Empanadas Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 pkt Continental Recipe Base Chilli Con Carne

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil and brown onion and mince. Add Recipe Base and 1/2 cup water and bring to the boil, simmer for 10 minutes. Allow to cool. Stir through olives and parsley.
Preheat oven 200 ÌŠC. Cut 5 circles out of each sheet of pastry, add a tablespoon of mince and fold to seal and create a parcel.
Place on baking trays lined with baking paper, brush with beaten egg and cook for 15 minutes until golden brown.
Serve with tomato salsa or chutney.
